prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon that glows softly in the dark with a pink and purple color scheme.
I want to see a jelly-like Pokemon that floats gracefully with a whimsical design and pastel colors.
Generate a water-type Pokemon resembling a jellyfish, featuring flowing tentacles and vibrant shades of pink.
Make a fairy-type Pokemon with a unique amorphous shape, adorned with soft clouds and elegant colors.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in the sea, showcasing a blend of pink and purple with ghostly features.
Design a Pokemon that embodies elegance and mystery, with flowing forms and a serene color palette.
Give me a jellyfish-inspired Pokemon that has a playful demeanor, blending shades of pink and purple beautifully.
